title: How to defend Earth from asteroids
description: What's six miles wide and can end civilization in an instant? An asteroid -- and there are lots of them out there. With humor and great visuals, Phil Plait shows us all the ways asteroids can kill us (yipes), and what we must do to avoid them.
author: Phil Plait
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, astronomy, dinosaurs, science, technology, space, NASA, asteroid
